special_text:
I – Create a 4/4 white Demigod creature token with flying.
II – Create Sword of Seiros, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with indestructible, “Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.” and equip Demigod {3}.
III – Create Shield of Seiros, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with indestructible, “Equipped creature has indestructible.” and equip Demigod {4}.
